programme.title: Darpana
programme.desc: The movie gives a clear message that God's universal unchangeable laws of life and death can't be completely manipulated by science or scientists.

programme.title: Karunada Huli Maylara Mahadeva
programme.desc: Mailara Mahadevappa, a freedom fighter from Haveri, Karnataka, goes against the British rule and loses his life during a warfare against the government.

programme.title: Bandhu Balaga
programme.desc: Subramanya, the illegitimate son of a village headman, lands in trouble when his father divides the property equally between him and his three stepbrothers.

programme.title: Ninne Preethisuve
programme.desc: A soldier dies in a war after his marriage gets fixed with Meghamala. When she learns that his eyes are donated to another man, a sudden turn of events changes her life forever.

programme.title: Baro Nanna Muddina Krishna
programme.desc: A cop is smitten with a woman who works as a policewoman at his police station. This leads to a huge amount of tension between her and her husband.

programme.title: Silicon City
programme.desc: Sanjay thinks that he is living the perfect family life. He is shocked when he realises that his younger brother, Karthik, is in a wrong company.

programme.title: Gokarna
programme.desc: Old Movie, Synopsis not availalale.

programme.title: Sakha Sakhi
programme.desc: Shiva is a hot-headed youngster who is irresponsible and roams around with his friends. He meets an assertive girl, Viji, with whom he fights all the time, but eventually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Gandu Katada Thali
programme.desc: An obsessive man sabotages every proposal for the woman he desires. But when she falls for someone else, his obsession takes a dark turn, leading to conflict and drama.

programme.title: South End Circle
programme.desc: A man is obedient towards his mother and overcomes all the obstacles life throws his way. Unfortunately, his mother disapproves of his marriage and causes problems for him.

programme.title: Gokarna
programme.desc: Old Movie, Synopsis not availalale.

programme.title: Sneha
programme.desc: A man writes a love letter to a girl during his friend's wedding. Things turn upside down when the letter reaches the bride instead of that girl.

programme.title: Giri Kanye
programme.desc: An estate manager sets his eyes on a beautiful girl. When he tries to misbehave with her, a good-hearted man comes to her rescue.

programme.title: Madha Matthu Manasi
programme.desc: Madha falls in love with Manasi. But he learns that she is in love with someone else. He helps her reunite with her lover.

programme.title: Neelakanta
programme.desc: A man is obedient towards his mother and overcomes all the obstacles life throws his way. Unfortunately, his mother disapproves of his marriage and causes problems for him.

programme.title: Kalbettada Daredekorarau
programme.desc: The villagers of Hangod live their daily lives growing tobacco, which is their chief source of income. However, they face various struggles that include robberies, a mysterious hill and rival gangs.

programme.title: Karthavyada Kare
programme.desc: The movie starring A S Raj, Udayachandrika, Yashraj, B V Radha, Ranga, B S Dwarakish in lead roles and is directed by Sunand.

programme.title: Tootu Madike
programme.desc: In pursuit of a valuable antique figurine, a corrupt politician hires a group of people from the slum to find it. However, chaos ensues when numerous people become obsessed with it.

programme.title: Neelakanta
programme.desc: A man is obedient towards his mother and overcomes all the obstacles life throws his way. Unfortunately, his mother disapproves of his marriage and causes problems for him.

programme.title: Mannina Doni
programme.desc: Karthik meets Saubhagya. Despite her father's disapproval, the two get married and head to Mysuru, where a mystery begins to unfold.

programme.title: Amrithadhare
programme.desc: Puru and Amritha are a married couple deeply in love with each other. However, they face challenges as they try to balance their conflicting desires in their marriage.

programme.title: Crack
programme.desc: The movie portrays a thrilling story about a cop who travels from one place to another to KRACK a murder mystery.

programme.title: E Bandhana
programme.desc: Ee Bandhana is a 2007 Indian Kannada-language drama film written, directed and co-produced by Vijayalakshmi Singh. This marks her debut directorial project. It stars Vishnuvardhan and Jayapradha. While Darshan, Ananth Nag, Tara, Sharmiela Mandre, Tarun Chandra and Jennifer Kotwal form the rest of the ensemble cast. The movie was produced by Jai Jagadish for Dakshath Combines.

programme.title: Trayambakam
programme.desc: Shivarudraiah lives in constant fear of losing his daughter. He seeks psychological help but is still unable to differentiate between dream and reality.

programme.title: Nala Damayanthi
programme.desc: Old Movie,Synopsis not available.

programme.title: Sammohanam
programme.desc: A cartoonist who loathes movies unexpectedly falls for a film actress, leading to a hilariously awkward romance that challenges his disdain for the world of Hollywood.
